Project.name: PureMVC PHP Standard Version Unit Tests
Project.Description: These are the unit tests for the PureMVC Standard Version Framework for PHP.
Project.ReleaseNotes: Summary of Changes in 1.0.1 * Added missing value to constructor of FacadeTestVO which prevented FacadeTest.testRegisterCommandAndSendNotification() from passing... Summary of Changes in 1.0 * Prepared unit tests for port source code version 1.0 - OG/HO Summary of Changes in 0.4 * Corrected Singleton creation functionality - CLH Summary of Changes in 0.3 * Updated to AS3 2.0.1 functionality. - CLH Summary of Changes in 0.2 * Initial upload of ported code, doc is coming shortly - AST Features in 0.1 * Initial project structure created in repository - CLH
Project.Installation: Installing the Project Source Code From the archive * Download the latest source code archive. * Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. * For instance: c:\development\ * You will see a PureMVC_PHP_UnitTests_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. * For instance: c:\development\PureMVC_PHP_UnitTests_X_Y From the Repository * Use your favorite SVN client to retrieve the latest source code release from the repository.
